content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Hassan. I appreciate your time and consideration for this opportunity. I am looking for a fair and reasonable rental price that will benefit both of us. May I ask what you are willing to offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of x Euro. Can you tell me the details of the apartment?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Hassan. The apartment is located in a prime location in the city, with easy access to public transportation, shops, and restaurants. It has two rooms, a kitchen, and a bathroom, with a total area of 25 square meters. The apartment is fully furnished, including a comfortable bed, a dresser, a desk, and a chair. The rent for this apartment is negotiable, and I am open to discussing a fair and reasonable price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 400 Euro. Thank you for the opportunity to rent this apartment. Can you provide me with the lease agreement?

Also, do I have to pay any additional fees or charges?

I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I will pay all my rent on time.

Is there anything else I need to know before I move in?

Thank you for your assistance.

Sincerely,
Hassan Rahman.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Certainly, Hassan. I am glad to hear that you are willing to rent my apartment for 400 Euro per month. I will prepare the lease agreement for you to review and sign, and we can arrange a convenient time for you to pick it up or have it delivered to you.

Regarding additional fees or charges, there may be a security deposit that you will need to pay upon signing the lease agreement. The amount of the security deposit will be discussed during the negotiation process.

As for moving in, I will provide you with the necessary information and instructions to ensure a smooth process. I appreciate your prompt payment of rent and your commitment to being a good tenant. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.

Thank you for choosing my apartment, Hassan. I look forward to a successful and mutually beneficial rental arrangement.

Sincerely,
Heinrich Heine.
name: Heinrich Heine
